data.text:
About MORTE

MORTE is an Indie, and Adventure game developed by Jabritt Fernando Martinez Rojas. On 10/23/2020, it was released on the Steam Store by Jabritt Fernando Martinez Rojas.

It can be played and ran on Windows systems. At the moment, there is no confirmed information regarding Steam Deck support for this game.

According to Steamâs category system, MORTE supports the following features:

Family Sharing

Single-player
